mapper.insert: INSERT INTO USER_INFO (U_ID, U_PW, U_NAME, U_BIRTH, U_GENDE, U_EMAIL, U_ADDR1 , U_ADDR2) VALUES (#{u_id}, #{u_pw}, #{u_name}, #{u_birth}, #{u_gende}, #{u_email}, #{u_addr1}, #{u_addr2})
mapper.select: SELECT U_ID, U_PW, U_NAME, U_BIRTH, U_GENDE, U_EMAIL, U_ADDR1, U_ADDR2, U_JOINDATE FROM USER_INFO WHERE U_ID = #{u_id} AND U_PW = #{u_pw}
